name: Turtle Tactics
description:
Turtle Tactics is a turn based strategy game made in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2!

--------------------

Features:

  • Turn based strategic gameplay
  • Interesting puzzles.
  • Turtles.

--------------------

Controls:  (explained in game also)

Mouse - Aim

LMB - Pathfind to location

R - Restart

--------------------

Credits:

Programming - Nathcra

A* Tilemap pathfinding script for Godot Engine by Heartbeast: Tutorial

Art - Nathcra with Aseprite

SFX - Nathcra with BFXR

Music - Generated (!) with NARDOM_GEN

Proudly made with Godot Engine

--------------------

Thank you for playing!
